price: (Waambiwe): Huu ndio ule Moto mlio kuwa mkiukanusha!
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
footnotes: Wataambiwa: Huu ndio Moto mlio kuwa mkiukanusha duniani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
